Material used.Description: The experiment used HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased kinase activity observed compared to wild-type.
Altered kinase activity and protein phosphorylation levels.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% or kinase activity exceeding 200% of wild-type.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with LRRK2 variants for immunofluorescence analysis.

Readout description.Result Description: Altered protein localization to the cytoplasm compared to wild-type.
Mislocalization to the Golgi apparatus observed.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was imaged in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein localization to the cytoplasm in 90% of cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein localization to non-cytoplasmic compartments in 50% or more of cells.
